flaws potential threats and harmful users activities Participating in the deployment and configuration of new network analysis tools Intrusion Detection Sensors and harddrive encryption software Responsible for providing presentations to the executive committee on anyall security findings Maintaining all security servers related to workstation and network security This included updating each server ensuring the server was collecting adequate information and implementing hardening guidelines setforth by the agency Providing enduser support to those having difficulties with the various security software employed on their system Education BSc in Information System Security Johns Hopkins University 2006 Aa in Business Administration Carroll Community College 2003 Skills SECURITY IDS
